name: Site Establishment and Safety
Details
Delivery and goods lift location
Delivery requirements i.e. booking process
On site storage / office location
Site specific restrictions i.e. noise / starting times
Ductwork
Details
Ductwork installed as per latest drawing
Inspect ductwork is not damaged. Record and report for any issues
Confirm correct spacing / supports installed
Duct flanges firmly bolted and sealed correctly
Cleats installed as required
Ductwork insulated where required and free of damage
Ductwork restrained for wind/seismic where required
Confirm ductwork joints and seams are sealed
Pops & flex installed as per latest drawing
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for flex
Flexible duct connections completed correctly
Blade dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
BD pop access panel coordinated and marked
Cushion boxes installed as per latest drawing
Balancing dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
Volume Control Dampers installed as per latest drawing
Motorised dampers installed as per latest drawing / actuator fit off
Smoke dampers installed as per latest drawing / actuator fit off
Damper access panels coordinated and marked
Check all motorised dampers, fire damper and smoke damper are in open position.
Pipework
Details
Pipe and valve sets installed as per latest drawing/ schematics
Inspect the pipework is not damaged. Record and report for any issues
Confirm correct spacing of supports installed
Confirm couplings, unions and flanges securely fixed to the pipework
Confirm valves, strainers and major line fittings correctly installed as documented
Confirm spacers provided
Confirm insulation provided
Confirm air bleeds have been installed at the highest point and drains at the lowest point
Correct flow and return checked
Access to valve sets checked
No other services suspended from pipe work
Fire Damper
Details
Fire damper installed as per latest drawing
Installation as per manufacturer's installation guide
Fire Damper labelled with Mechonik's sticker
Breakaway joint fitted
Damper access installed in duct
Access panel installed on RCP for maintenance/ inspection access
Drains
Details
Drain trapped where required
Drain pump installed on a gradient/ level
Drain terminates at a tundish
Drain pipe insulated where required
Drains, pump and tundish access for maintenance
Drain pipe is labelled clearly
CRAC Unit
Details
Unit installed as per latest drawing
Inspect the unit is not damaged. Record and report for any issues
Unit is labelled clearly
Unit correctly supported as per documented
Confirm pipework connections to the unit are correct and include all fittings and accessories as documented
Confirm drains are terminated correctly
Confirm all thermal insulation and sheating is complete and undamaged
Confirm electrical connection to unit
Adequate maintenance clearance maintained
Fan Coil Unit
Details
FCU installed as per latest drawing
Inspect the unit casing is not damaged. Record and report for any issues
Unit is labelled clearly
Unit correctly supported as per documented
Confirm safety tray and/ or condensate drain provided to the units and is piped to adjacent waste point
Confirm installation of any dampers on the units
Confirm correct CDW pipe work installed as per latest drawing (e.g. Valves, binder points, air vents)
Confirm electrical connection to unit
Flexible connections installed
Air filters installed
Confirm seismic bracing to requirements
Unit complete with acoustic wrapping as per documented
Adequate maintenance clearance maintained
Split DX Unit
Details
FCU and condensing units installed as per latest drawing
Inspect the FCU and condensing unit. Record and report for any issues
Unit is labelled clearly
Unit correctly supported as per documented
Confirm safety tray and/ or condensate drain provided to the units and is piped to adjacent waste point
Confirm refrigeration pipework are installed
Confirm refrigeration pipework insulation are installed with adequate support
Confirm correct eletrical connections to the refrigeration system as per wiring schematic
Adequate maintenance and ventilation clearance maintained
Installed as per manufacturer's requirements. Refer to specific equipment schedule for detail.
Fan
Details
Fan installed as per latest drawing
Inspect the fan. Record and report for any issues
Fan is labelled clearly
Confirm ductwork connections to the fans are correct and include flexible connections
Confirm test points, sensors and gauges have been provided and installed as documented
Confirm correct eletrical connections to the fan
Adequate maintenance clearance maintained
Unit complete with acoustic wrapping as per documented
Installed as per manufacturer's requirements. Refer to specific equipment schedule for detail.
Grille Fit-Off
Details
Confirm grilles type and colour as per schedule
Grilles installed in correct location as per latest duct layout / RCP
Inspect the grille. Record and report for any issues
Grille left clean of fingerprints and caps installed where required
Area left clean/tidy (Any Issues comment below)

Details
All work in zone completed and appear compliant
Pass once all work complete
